result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:50 AM Defendant Timothy T. Irving in court.  Attorney Alyssah M Foster in court for Timothy T. Irving.  Attorney Andrew Joseph Burgoyne in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.   Adjmt granted for offer and discussions with DE. Bond continued.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: State of Wisconsin appears by ADA Andrew Burgoyne.  Defendant appeared in person pro se.  Clerk/S. Garcia.  The DE did go to SPD and states they will appoint, however it will take about 6 weeks.  Status set for 10/7/22 @ 10:30.
Final pre-trial on October 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk HMcBride.   DE would like an atty, but he has not been to the SPD office yet.  DE to go to SPD today to apply.  Adjmt granted.  STC 8/22 2:30pm.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Continued Posted
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.    *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription. No violent contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with:  Barbara C.  *Not To Discuss Case w/ Barbara C, Duane W

309PM   Attorney Emily Gaertner and Intern Sydney Star appeared for the State.   Defendant appeared in court in person. Victim: B.C.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.   Plea of Not Guilty entered by the Court. Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 02:10 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 10:00 am. $350  Cash Bond continued posted w/ additional conditions (see bond entry). mi
